Class JenaPersistanceSession

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.rdf.semantic.persistance.jena.JenaPersistanceSession
All Implemented Interfaces:
PersistanceSession
public class JenaPersistanceSession
extends java.lang.Object
implements PersistanceSession

This interface defines the method to manage the perstance to the backend data store.
